resources.string:
Welcome to the RemoteMed Application!
 Currently this is a small operation but there is room for rapid expansion.
 Currently just a seizure detection module is available. 
 We are working day and night to provide you with the best possible remote medical solutions. 
 May you stay in good health eternally.
If you are a person who is accessing this app in case of an emergency, please select the user
No users registered on this device!
You are not using any modules. \n Go to settings and turn on a module now!
No seizures have occurred thus far.
No ICE numbers are set. \n Please add some. \n To do this use the menu.
